duties_responsibilities.duty: Support, mentor, and motivate the hourly workforce, and manage safety, quality, productivity, and customer delivery promises.
Collaborate with support teams including Safety, Engineering, Loss Prevention, Quality Assurance, Human Resources to develop plans to meet business objectives.
Be physically capable to lift up to 49 pounds and perform various physical tasks as necessary for the role.
Manage work shifts in an environment with variable noise level, temperature, and weather conditions, as well as continuous stair climbing and descending.
Hire based on location preference and business’ current openings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or 2+ years of Amazon (blue badge/FTE) experience
